professionalSummary: Versatile Front-End Developer with 3+ years of experience building and optimizing scalable web applications across healthcare, e-commerce, and enterprise platforms. Proficient in ReactJS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and Redux, with a strong focus on creating responsive, accessible, and user-centric interfaces. Skilled in modern UI frameworks like Material UI, Ant Design, and Bootstrap, and experienced in back-end integration using Node.js, ExpressJS, and RESTful APIs. Adept in DevOps tools such as Docker, Git, and Heroku, with hands-on experience deploying applications via AWS and managing CI/CD workflows. Strong background in working with SQL and NoSQL databases, including MongoDB, Firebase, and SQL Server, with proven ability to design secure, scalable data flows. Passionate about clean code, agile collaboration, and continuously evolving with technologies like Next.js and Tailwind CSS to deliver high-performing, maintainable products.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Designed and developed responsive web applications with ReactJS, Redux, TypeScript, and Spring Boot backend APIs.
Created reusable React components and hooks to accelerate development and ensure consistency across modules.
Built secure RESTful APIs in Java, integrating patient, claims, and coverage data with backend systems.
Implemented role-based authentication and authorization using Spring Security and JWT.
Collaborated with UI/UX teams to ensure compliance with WCAG 2.1 accessibility standards and HIPAA regulations.
Improved application performance by reducing page load time by 30% using React performance optimizations.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Developed front-end features using ReactJS, Redux, and TypeScript, ensuring a responsive and modern UI.
Built backend services with Java Spring Boot, managing clinical research workflows and task automation.
Integrated Zoho APIs for CRM and workflow automation, reducing manual effort by 25%.
Customized and enhanced Shopify themes using Liquid, HTML5, and CSS3 to meet branding requirements.
Created interactive dashboards with Material UI and Bootstrap for better research data visualization.
Designed GraphQL APIs for optimized querying of clinical data.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Built and deployed 5+ web applications using ReactJS (frontend) and Node.js/MongoDB (backend).
Migrated legacy applications to ReactJS class components, ensuring long-term maintainability.
Designed and implemented real-time dashboards with live maps and data streams for client monitoring.
Optimized MongoDB queries and indexes to enhance system performance and scalability.
Deployed applications on AWS EC2 and S3 with Docker containers for CI/CD.
Implemented user authentication and authorization using JWT and OAuth 2.0.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Designed healthcare analytics dashboards using ReactJS for UI and Node.js for backend services.
Built data visualization modules to track value-based care metrics and population health insights.
Developed Node.js REST APIs for data ingestion from enterprise healthcare systems.
Optimized SQL queries and backend pipelines, improving large-scale dataset processing by 30%.
Integrated APIs with payment adjudication systems for bundled payments and claims processing.
Migrated monolithic applications into modular microservices with Node.js and Express.

projects.name: Lodgenest
description: Developed a web-based property management platform for seamless apartment search and bookings (ReactJS, TypeScript, NodeJS, AntDesign, Axios).
Built secure user authentication and role-based access control.
Implemented a real-time messaging system, and designed database schemas and use cases.
